text: Should the United States and Europe work together to counter and contain China? If so, how should they do it? An event next week in DC, and a good way to take the temperature of the relationship.

text: China was incomparably worse in the 1950s, 1960s, and 1970s. See for example a man-made famine which killed tens of millions of people, or the Cultural Revolution, which cratered society and led to the death and imprisonment of thousands, if not millions.
